description:
Most of the OS API controllers wrap faults with something like:

            return faults.Fault(exc.HTTPConflict(explanation=msg))

Given that we already use FaultWrapper middleware this extra wrap is unnecessary.

We should make things consistent and either remove all the extra fault.Fault wrapping code.
title: Remove unnecessary fault.Fault wrapping from OSAPI
